message: How's my baby boo doing today?
Hey boo, how was your day?
Did you wake up that beautiful?
Hey baby, I've got a surprise for you. When can we meet up?
You keep running through my mind all day boo.
Hey babe, I'm sorry about last night...
Of course I wouldn't forget! Happy Birthday baby boo!
Did you really think I would forget? Happy Anniversary baby boo!

Hey baby. I know I haven't been treating you the best for the past few days, but I just want to say that I want to make it up to you. I promise. So how about tomorrow night? It will be just you and I, no one else, and we can rekindle the flame that you thought was lost. I'll be a better boo just for you.

I know I'm not the best with words, so this is a lot for me, but I care about you too much to let this slide. I want to say that I'm sorry. I know I was in the wrong and I realize that now. I want to put my pride away and only want to focus on us. I care about you and want to make things better. So can you give me a chance to explain myself?

I know it's been a minute but I just want you to know that you've been running through my mind like nobody's business. You're all I think about and I wouldn't want it any other way. Don't be shy now because you know the feeling's mutual. I'll be waiting for that phone call boo. Hit me up.
